description: Create a cube with fillets in FreeCAD
instruction_template: The application is already open. Create a cube in FreeCAD with length ${cube_length}mm, width ${cube_width}mm, and height ${cube_height}mm, then add fillets with a radius of ${fillet_radius}mm to all its edges. The cube should be created as an additive cube (typeid), and the fillets should be created using the create a fillet feature on cube. Do not create the shapes separately and use Boolean subtraction or cut. Finally, save the file to ${source_path}${filename}

function_key_word_detected.description: Detected key content in saved document
function_key_word_detected.key_step_name: Created cube with fillets and saved successfully
